TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChangePasswordDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素对象派生自类，并从内部定义 XML 编码的常量字符串填充。The elements of the object are derived from the class and are populated from internally defined XML-encoded constant strings.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的关联模式控件，可以复制，到实际的控件的当前模式。The method sets the mode of the associated control, which can be a copy, to the current mode of the actual control. 接下来，它会强制子控件，以重新创建，然后调用基方法，以生成标记。Next, it forces the child controls to be recreated, and then calls the base method to generate the markup. 如果发生错误，调用方法来生成标记为的占位符。If an error occurs, the calls the method to generate the markup for a placeholder.

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基方法，因为它在最终调用控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，其中已添加关联的控件的当前视图的定义。

span.span: A to which a definition of the current view of the associated control has been added.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法来生成用于在设计时呈现标记控件。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 它还添加了对象传递给`regions`参数，用于描述当前视图的控件。It also adds a object to the `regions` parameter that describes the current view of the control.

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基方法，因为它在最终调用控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: 获取关联控件的当前模板的持久形式。

span.span: Gets the persisted form of the current template of the associated control.

returns.span: ，其中包含关联的 的当前模板的持久形式。

span.span: A containing the persisted form of the current template of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法序列化当前模板 (或属性) 的持久形式，这是控件标记文本的对象。The method serializes the current template (the or property) of the control to its persisted form, which is a object of markup text. 此持久化的窗体包含追加在一起的序列化的子控件。This persisted form consists of the serialized child controls appended together.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

param.name: e
param.span: 创建或呈现关联的控件时抛出的 异常。

span.span: The that was thrown while creating or rendering the associated control.

summary.span: 获取呈现为占位符的标记，该占位符中包含尝试在设计时创建或呈现关联的控件时产生的错误的有关信息。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders to a placeholder containing information about the error that occurred while attempting to create or render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 包含指定异常的有关信息的占位符的标记。

span.span: The markup for the placeholder that contains information about the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 占位符包含的类型和控件的名称，错误消息和与关联的属性`e`参数。The placeholder contains the type and control names, an error message, and the property that is associated with the `e` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主调用方法准备设计器用于呈现时控件。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并设置连接所需的设计器操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器中或指定的控件的副本关联的控件`component`。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control specified by `component`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器用于在“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加或删除属性从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 有关控件，方法设置属性设为`false`不适用于模板的属性 (中删除它们从**属性**网格) 当已用户模板定义。For the control, the method sets the attribute to `false` for properties that do not apply to templates (removes them from the **Properties** grid) when a user template has been defined.

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到或更改的设计时属性集合中的属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定 控件是否使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则。

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用的外部表容器来应用标记中的内联样式规则。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 此属性设置为 true，可以删除外部表容器。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to true. 删除外部表，可更好的灵活性，你可如何将 CSS 规则应用于由控件呈现的标记。Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.

Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)

span.span: The to set content for.

param.name: content
param.span: ，包含一个持久性控件或模板。

span.span: A containing a persisted control or template.

summary.span: 设置关联控件的模板的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a template of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在设计器中的控件或通过其持久化窗体中指定的模板设置可编辑区域`content`参数。The method sets an editable region in a designer to a control or template that is specified in its persisted form by the `content` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取与此设计器关联的控件的模板组成的模板组的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the templates of the control that is associated with this designer.

value.span: ，其中为关联的 的每个模板包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造对象并返回基属性的集合，并用其填充它。The property constructs a object and populates it with the collection returned by the base property. 然后，它添加对象每个模板 (和) 关联的控件。It then adds a object for each of the templates ( and ) of the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终是`true`，该设计器使用包含关联的临时副本控件控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制不影响任何持久性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果属性已重写以返回`false`，设计器将使用关联本身来生成设计时标记。If the property were overridden to return `false`, the designer would use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或者想要确定基于是否使用类级别标记控件了其值对象。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object.

para.span: 如果不重写，对象将忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
